description: Carrier 4-ton AC unit stopped cooling. Diagnosed failed compressor capacitor. Replaced capacitor, recharged refrigerant, tested system. Customer quoted for full system replacement due to age.
Annual pre-summer PM visit. Replace air filter, check refrigerant levels, calibrate thermostat, inspect electrical connections, test startup.
Setup new customer account, enroll in Bronze service plan, schedule first annual PM visit for January 2025.
Quarterly PM on Carrier RTU #1. Replace filters, check refrigerant, inspect economizer dampers, test BAS integration, measure airflow.
Quarterly PM on Carrier RTU #2. Replace filters, check refrigerant, inspect economizer dampers, test BAS integration, measure airflow.
Daikin RTU #1 not cooling. High foot traffic retail zone experiencing 85°F temps. Dispatched technician for emergency diagnosis.
Mission-critical chiller PM. Vibration analysis, oil sample, refrigerant leak check, control calibration. 2-hour SLA response contract.

taskName: Precision Cooling PM - Data Center A
siteName: Phoenix Data Center - Server Room A
description: Monthly PM on Liebert precision cooling units (3 units). Check refrigerant, calibrate humidity controls, test N+1 redundancy failover, clean filters.

taskName: Generator Load Bank Test - Data Center
siteName: Phoenix Data Center - Server Room A
description: Monthly 500kW generator load bank test. Run at 100% load for 2 hours, check voltage/frequency stability, inspect fuel system, test ATS.
Monthly O&M visit. Inverter inspection, tracker calibration check, panel cleaning (50,000 panels), thermal imaging scan for hot spots.
Rinnai tankless water heater ignition failure. Replaced igniter, descaled heat exchanger, tested gas pressure, verified flow rate.
Quarterly grease interceptor pumping. Remove FOG, inspect baffles, clean inlet/outlet, health department compliance check.
Annual backflow preventer test (4-inch RP). ASSE 6010 certified tester required. Hospital water supply protection compliance.
200A panel upgrade for Tesla EV charger. Install new panel, 60A dedicated circuit, NEMA 14-50 outlet, load calculation on file.
Replace 300 fluorescent fixtures with LED. Photometric plan on file, utility rebate approved, weekend install to avoid disruption.
Tri-annual arc flash study per NFPA 70E. Model switchgear, calculate incident energy, apply labels, provide PPE recommendations.
8kW residential solar install. 24x335W panels, 24 Enphase microinverters, south-facing roof mount, utility PTO granted 12/1/24.
300kW rooftop solar install. 750x400W panels, SMA 300kW inverter, PPA agreement, net metering active, demand charges reduced 40%.
3MWh Tesla Megapack install. Peak shaving strategy, demand response enrollment, UL 9540A fire testing, utility interconnection study.
Insurance claim roof replacement. Remove old tile, install ice/water shield, GAF Timberline HDZ shingles, 30-year warranty registered.
48,000 sq ft TPO flat roof membrane. Firestone UltraPly, 10-year NDL warranty, annual inspections scheduled.
NFPA 25 quarterly inspection. Test flow switches, inspect heads for obstructions, check valve tamper switches, fire marshal report.
Annual FM-200 clean agent system test. Verify cylinder pressure, test discharge nozzles, inspect manual pull stations, Joint Commission compliance.
Quote for Carrier 4-ton AC replacement. 16 SEER unit, $8,500 installed, 10-year parts warranty, 2-year labor warranty.
Quote for Trane 100-ton chiller replacement. Mission-critical, 2-hour SLA, $150K installed, commissioning included.
Invoice #227 for emergency AC repair. Compressor capacitor replacement, refrigerant recharge, $2,400 total. Payment received 12/18.
Invoice for Bronze service plan enrollment. $150 annual PM visit, payment received 12/12.
Invoice for Rinnai tankless water heater repair. Igniter replacement, descaling, $850 total. Payment pending.
Invoice for 8kW solar install. Cash purchase, $24,000 total. Customer claimed 30% ITC ($7,200) on 2024 taxes.
Install Tesla Wall Connector. 60A circuit from new panel, NEMA 14-50 outlet, load calculation verified, permit approved.
Lennox RTU economizer stuck closed. Recalibrate damper actuator, test free cooling mode, verify BAS integration.
Executive suite reporting hot/cold spots. Diagnose VRF zoning issue, check refrigerant distribution, recalibrate zone controls.
Cold storage refrigeration leak. -10°F setpoint not holding. EPA 608 certified tech dispatched, leak detection in progress.
Medical vacuum alarm in ER. Diagnosed duplex pump failure, switched to backup pump, ordered replacement parts, NFPA 99 compliance.
Annual cooling tower cleaning. Drain, pressure wash, inspect fill media, check drift eliminators, quarterly water treatment.
SMA central inverter showing faults. Replace faulty inverter board, test production recovery, update SCADA, O&M contract covered.
Quarterly Tesla Megapack state of health check. Thermal management inspection, cycle count review, capacity test, software update.
20 high-bay LED fixtures not functioning. Diagnose driver failures, replace faulty drivers, photometric verification.
Annual backflow preventer test (2-inch RP). Certified tester required, submit report to water utility, restaurant compliance.
Fire alarm panel battery replacement (5-year cycle). UL/FM listed batteries, test backup power, verify monitoring signal.
Replace 10 fire sprinkler heads in patient tower. Heads painted over (code violation), install new Viking heads, pressure test.
Startup and commissioning of 2x Trane RTUs in annex. BAS integration, TAB report, training for building manager, warranty registration.
Semi-annual solar panel cleaning. 750 panels, deionized water wash, production verification post-cleaning, PPA O&M contract.
Annual roof inspection per warranty. Inspect TPO membrane, check seams, verify drainage, IR thermography for moisture, manufacturer report.

description: 5-year UPS battery replacement. APC Symmetra PX 200kVA, install new battery modules, capacity test, Tier III uptime maintenance.
Annual chiller vibration analysis. Predictive maintenance contract, bearing condition monitoring, oil sample analysis, 2-hour SLA.
